channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Why write a blog?
item.description: In 2021, I bought a new keyboard for stenography. It wasn’t until a year later, when I committed to writing a daily diary with it, that I actually started learning steno. At the start of 2022, I set a simple, achievable goal: write 20 words every day. We’ll come back to how well I kept that habit, but this year I’ve set a new goal: write 500 words each week, and publish it here, my new—hopefully lifelong—blog.
